thread.title: Oscars 2017: See the bling that stole the show
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: See the bling that stole the show

title: Oscars 2017: See the bling that stole the show
text: Oscars 2017: See the bling that stole the show Charlize Theron was dripping in Chopard jewels. The drop earrings featured 59.9 carats worth of diamonds. Post to Facebook Oscars 2017: See the bling that stole the show Charlize Theron was dripping in Chopard jewels. The drop earrings featured 59.9 carats worth of diamonds.  //usat.ly/2lKHrlG   Oscars 2017: See the bling that stole the show None Charlize Theron was dripping in Chopard jewels. The drop earrings featured 59.9 carats worth of diamonds. Paul Buck, EPA None Taraji P. Henson is flawless in Nirav Modi gems. Look at those diamonds around her neck! Mike Nelson, EPA None Ruth Negga donned a high fashion, Irene Neuwirth head piece, featuring 146.16 carats of Gemfields Mozambican rubies. She paired it with earrings of Gemfields Mozambican rubies and diamonds, Frazer Harrison, Getty Images None Isabelle Huppert's Repossi ear cuff adds an edgy French je ne sais quoi to her look. Frazer Harrison, Getty Images Nicole Kidman delights in 119 carats of Harry Winston jewels. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY NETWORK None Jessica Biel was decked out in a Tiffany & Co. Whispers of the Rain Forest necklace. Dan MacMedan, Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK None Model Karlie Kloss slays in Nirav Modi floral diamond choker, and a pair of diamond earrings. Steve Granitz, WireImage Alicia Vikander flashes Bulgari perfection. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY NETWORK None Chrissy Teigen wore huge, champagne-colored earrings by Lorraine Schwartz. PAUL BUCK, EPA Like this topic? You may also like these photo galleries: Replay
